thread.title: BRIEF-Valeant And One Of Its Subsidiaries Commence Cash Tender Offers For Up To $1,250,000,000 Outstanding Principal Amount

title: BRIEF-Valeant And One Of Its Subsidiaries Commence Cash Tender Offers For Up To $1,250,000,000 Outstanding Principal Amount

organizations.name: min read   valeant pharmaceuticals international inc

text: March 12, 2018 / 11:45 AM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Valeant And One Of Its Subsidiaries Commence Cash Tender Offers For Up To $1,250,000,000 Outstanding Principal Amount Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 12 (Reuters) - Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc: * VALEANT AND ONE OF ITS SUBSIDIARIES COMMENCE CASH TENDER OFFERS FOR UP TO $1,250,000,000 OUTSTANDING PRINCIPAL AMOUNT * VALEANT - ‍TENDER OFFERS FOR NOTES WILL EXPIRE ON APRIL 9, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
